Isn't it funny how they opened Good Sense stores near Bottom Dollar stores and immediately closed them all when Bottom Dollar went out of business...? They made monopolized the Pgh grocery market by cutting Krogers, A&Ps and Foodlands throats with really low prices and now the that their competition is all gone, they've raised their prices to the roof! And you people who think that ge's fuel perks are a good deal need to buy some swampland in Fla. But, they are buddies with the the local and state leftist politicians, so their legally questionable business tactics will never be scrutinized... >>NEVER BUY AT GIANT TURD-BIRD STORES<<

This is great news for Tesla. As the EV market becomes real with real competition, what they are doing is validated. GM is notorious for producing cars that produce good bullet points, but drive poorly and break down early (or has something changed recently?), a nice competitor to have. The Volt and Bolt are really ugly, and I can't figure out what I'm supposed to do once I'm out of power away from home.

Mexico is not a bad place it depends what you do and who you hang with . . for me I've been to mexicali, Tijuana, guanajuato, Guadalajara, and many more places . . and there's nothing bad going on . . it disappoints me when I ask people have you been to Mexico and they reply no and I'll never go there . . it's scary or I'll get kidnapped by the cartel . . It depends who you know and what you do that causes that attention . . Mexico is a safe beautiful place. <ed> <ed> I'm proud to be 100% Latina <ed> <ed>
